de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.tripmodel.generators

Class RandomTripGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.mobisim.core.ExtensionModule
      • de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.tripmodel.generators.RandomTripGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NotificationListener, XMLStreamable, TripGenerator

    public class RandomTripGenerator
extends ExtensionModule
implements TripGenerator
    This class generates random trips for a node

    Patches:

    Version 1.2 by Jerome Haerri (haerri@ieee.org) on 11/30/2005:
         In order to reflect direction, if we use a SpaceGraph element with differentiated flows, we need to set the reflect direction to true in both Elements.
         The Generator returns the Algorithm used.

    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    1.0-1.1 Illya Stepanov, 1.2 Jerome Haerri

      • act

        public int act()
        Executes the extension.

        The method is called on every simulation timestep.
        Specified by:
        act in class ExtensionModule
        Returns:
        0 - the module should be executed on next timesteps, -1 - the module should not be executed on further timesteps and should be removed from the extensions' list
